title: TDS IITM Certified Books

posts.content: Can anyone forward the specified links of the books(iitm certified(logo)) or pdf's for preparation?

There are no IITM certified books nor PDFs for Tools in Data Science. The site https://tds.s-anand.net/ is the reference. We update the content regularly. You might want to track the changes for recent updates.

answer_summary: There are no IITM certified books for TDS. The official reference is https://tds.s-anand.net/ which is updated regularly.

answer_summary: Week 6 assignments and Project 2 releases depend on course schedule. Check course announcements for updates.

title: Solving ROE Realtime

posts.content: I'll try to post whatever i solve lol XD

Q 7 LLM Embeddings (1 mark): SecurePay fraud detection with text embeddings. ANSWER: {"model": "text-embedding-3-small", "input": ["Dear user, please verify your transaction code 33692 sent to roe-23f1002382@ds.study.iitm.ac.in", "Dear user, please verify your transaction code 66801 sent to roe-23f1002382@ds.study.iitm.ac.in"]}
Q 6 Move and rename files (1 mark): Use mv to move files and rename replacing digits. Commands: unzip, mkdir empty_folder, find -exec mv, tr '0123456789' '1234567890'

answer_summary: ROE exam includes practical questions on LLM embeddings and file operations using command line tools.

title: Regarding GitHub Mail for Project

posts.content: Is it important to use an IITM mail ID in GitHub for the project?

Currently we do not have any explicit policy regarding requiring IITM email as the github profile name or the github repo owner. We DO however require you to use your IITM email when submitting the project submission form. We are clarifying with operations at the moment if this arrangement satisfies their requirements.

answer_summary: No explicit policy requires IITM email for GitHub profile, but IITM email must be used in project submission form.

title: ROE Exam Purpose

posts.content: I check this term paper sir, I was written "This question paper is hackable". What that meant?

answer_summary: ROE exam is designed to be challenging and test practical skills. The term 'hackable' refers to its open-internet nature.

title: Score Keeps Resetting to 0

posts.content: Despite saving multiple times, my score keeps resetting to zero. Should I refill the answers for all the questions before saving again? Could this issue also be caused by accessing the assignment from multiple devices?

We are aware of the issue and @s.anand is working on a solution. The temporary fix is to just reenter all the answers before hitting the Save button. The last submission is always saved. So please make sure that your last submission contains all the answers for all the questions.

Please check this fix. It may solve your problem. I added a "Recent saves" feature. This will show the time and score for the last 3 times you saved. You can load from any of these. Do remember to click the "Check" button to calculate your score. That is not automatic.

answer_summary: Score resetting issue was fixed with 'Recent saves' feature. Always reenter all answers before saving and click 'Check' to calculate score.

title: PDF to Markdown Conversion Doubt

answer_summary: For PDF to Markdown conversion issues, refer to course materials on data preparation techniques and tools like Tabula.
